title: League client suddenly closed
body: i was on my way to report someone in the game otherwise i wouldn't care. I hold every report near and dear to my heart. like a vote that says "this person made the game unnecessarily difficult and it was not fun and i don't want anyone in any elo to deal with it" but that vote ballot had swiftly been taken from me by a randomly crashing/closing client.

replies.body: Don't worry, one report is all it takes to trigger the Instant Feedback System.  If the player was negative enough to warrant reports from others then it will still be reviewed.  Regarding the sudden close, is this a normal occurrence.  Were there any error messages?  I'd love to help just let me know!
from what i saw it just closed. nothing else popped up. should i be looking somewhere else for it?
wow i had a client crash too right now , although unrelated to  your specific circumstances
